name: Bagua
description:
BAGUA is an action game with Taiji Bagua as the main element. Players need to play the role of the Bagua group to maintain the balance of each time and space, and go to the balance of the affected time and space to correct the imbalance phenomenon. In this demo, players will travel to ancient Japan to correct the imbalance of space-time affected by the power of Xun(Wind).

In the game, players will be able to equip two weapons at the same time. The game currently offers players three weapons to choose from: the greatsword, the katana and the bow, and players can choose to combine them in a way that best suits your style of play, although it is possible to have two of the same weapon at the same time. In addition, the dual weapon system allows you to recharge your Yin/Yang slots, and when both slots are recharged, players will be able to use the powerful Taiji ability that can turn the tide of battle. In battle, as the player's attacks accumulate, the power of Taiji will give the player the opportunity to switch between weapons, which can bring you great convenience in battle. In terms of spells, all spells in the game require players to use GUA on the Bagua panel to combine, and whether or not you can use the GUA board skillfully is often the key to testing the power of a Bagua player. (Only four GUAs are open in the current demo)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

<八卦御衡>是一款以太极八卦为主要元素的动作游戏。玩家需要扮演维护各个时空平衡的八卦御衡者，并前往平衡受影响的时空去对失衡现象进行修正。在此次的Demo中，玩家将会来到古代的日本，对受到了巽之力而失衡的时空进行御衡修正。

在游戏中，玩家将可以同时装备两把武器。当前游戏为玩家提供了三把可选用武器, 分别为大剑, 武士刀与弓，玩家可以选择两两组合选择出最适合你风格的玩法, 当然你若想同时持有两把一样的武器也是完全有可能的。此外，双武器系统可以为你的阴/阳槽进行充能，当两个槽充能完毕后玩家将能使用可以扭转战局的御衡技能。在战斗中，随着玩家攻击的积累，太极之力将会给予玩家可以进行武器切换攻击的机会，活用武器切换攻击可以为你的战斗带来极大的便利。法术方面, 游戏中所有的法术都要求玩家在八卦盘上用卦象进行组合，而能否熟练地使用八卦盘往往是考验一个八卦御衡者强大与否的关键。(当前Demo仅开放四个卦象)
